news.title: U.S. economy grew at a 3% rate in Q2, a better-than-expected pace even as Trump's tariffs hit
news.summary: Gross domestic product was expected to grow at a 2.3% annualized pace in the second quarter, according to the consensus estimate.

news.title: Trump announces 25% tariff on India plus 'penalty' for trade with Russia
news.summary: The 25% tariff rate is modestly lower than what he imposed on India on "Liberation Day," when he announced a 26% rate on the key trading partner.

news.title: Palo Alto Networks to acquire CyberArk in $25 billion deal
news.summary: Palo Alto Networks will takeover Israeli cybersecurity provider CyberArk in a deal valued at $25 billion. Palo Alto Networks to take over CyberArk. CyberArk is one of the world's largest providers of cybersecurity services.

news.title: Trump says Friday tariff deadline 'will not be extended'
news.summary: The U.S. will impose a 25% tariff on goods from India, plus a "penalty" for buying military gear and energy from Russia.

news.title: Private company hiring bounced back with a 104,000 increase in July, ADP says
news.summary: Payrolls rose by a seasonally adjusted 104,000 for the month. The gain reversed a loss of 23,000 in June.

news.title: GDP shows plump 3% growth rate in second quarter — but it’s not as healthy as it looks
news.summary: The U.S. expanded at a 3% annual pace in the second quarter, masking signs of weakness in the economy. Businesses and consumers grappled with how to respond to ongoing trade wars.

news.title: Kraft Heinz takes $9 billion charge for its stock’s ‘sustained decline’ as it ponders strategic options
news.summary: Kraft Heinz’s stock rose in early Wednesday trading. Kraft Heinz said it is still weighing strategic options, which reportedly include the sale of many of its grocery-store brands.

news.title: Starbucks vows a ‘wave of innovation’ next year. Will it get in the way of quicker service?
news.summary: Coffee chain promises “a wave of innovation” in 2026. The chain is expanding its operations across the U.S. and Europe.

news.title: Hershey lowers earnings outlook amid ongoing tariffs expense. Why the stock is rising.
news.summary: Hershey’s stock surges toward a more than 7-month high. Big earnings beat offset a lowered full-year outlook.

news.title: The stock market is turning into a casino — raise cash, and also buy this AI company, says strategist
news.summary: Yves Lamoureux has shifted his view on stocks to neutral from “extremely bullish,” as he says investors have turned into gamblers.
